page.title: 09EATING OUT IN NW. LONDON
page.content: Nowadays a lot of people like to eat out. A very popular place with children is{McDonald's}where they sell hamburgers, chips, milkshakes, soft drinks and sweet dishes.{Indian} restaurants have become very popular with adults.{Kentucky Fried Chicken}is also a favourite.{Chinese}restaurants and take-aways are very well liked. {Take-aways}are always cheaper but people like to eat out if they are celebrating or if they have a visitor or they simply want a change from home food. In the City's centre some restaurants are very expensive and you have to be wearing a tie or you can't go inside. There are also{Greek} restaurants or{Turkish}ones and they sell Kebabs which are delicious. In some eating places you have to pay a certain amount of money and then you can eat as much as you can.-Juned&Eric
